The bronze dagger is a dagger made of bronze. It is the most basic dagger in Old School Runescape, with the iron dagger surpassing it. Players are able to make a bronze dagger using the Smithing skill. This requires one bronze bar and a hammer and yields 12.5 Smithing experience. There are no level requirements to create or wield a bronze dagger.

It is the second-weakest dagger in the game. It outperforms the Dark/Glowing dagger, an artefact obtained during Legends' Quest, which has marginally superior accuracy bonuses but no strength bonus at all.

It is the first weapon that players obtain, during the Smithing tutorial on Tutorial Island. Despite becoming seemingly obsolete as the player is given a bronze sword in the next section of the tutorial, the bronze dagger does have some usefulness during the Magic Instructor's task given its small magic attack bonus.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 July 2021
(update)

The position of the weapon and its variants on female players has been adjusted so that they appear to be equipped properly.

10 December 2014
(update)

The super strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Br'ze dagger(p++)" to "Bronze dagger(p++)".

22 August 2006
(update)
  • The extra strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Bronze dagger(+)" to "Bronze dagger(p+)".
  • The super strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Bronze dagger(s)" to "Br'ze dagger(p++)".

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The bronze dagger is denounced by Vannaka as being a "butter knife". Because of this, it is commonly regarded as the "worst" weapon in the game, however, the bronze 2h sword arguably deals less damage per second.

The '''bronze dagger''' is a [[dagger]] made of [[bronze equipment|bronze]]. It is the most basic dagger in ''[[Old School Runescape]]'', with the [[iron dagger]] surpassing it. Players are able to make a bronze dagger using the [[Smithing]] skill. This requires one [[bronze bar]] and a [[hammer]] and yields 12.5 Smithing [[experience]]. There are no level requirements to create or wield a bronze dagger.

It is the second-weakest dagger in the game. It outperforms the [[Dark dagger|Dark]]/[[Glowing dagger]], an artefact obtained during [[Legends' Quest]], which has marginally superior accuracy bonuses but no strength bonus at all.

It is the first weapon that players obtain, during the Smithing tutorial on [[Tutorial Island]]. Despite becoming seemingly obsolete as the player is given a [[bronze sword]] in the next section of the tutorial, the bronze dagger does have some usefulness during the [[Magic Instructor]]'s task given its small magic attack bonus.
